responses.rationale: Reports a negative fact (fatality rate) without explicit calming language.
Reports actions taken (restriction, testing) without explicit calming language.
Reports a finding (trace amounts in milk) without explicit calming language.
Reports cases and limited testing without explicit calming language.
Reports a correction to numbers without explicit calming language.
Reports a correction to numbers without explicit calming language.
Reports a fact about cooking temperature without explicit calming language like 'safe'.
'It remains safe to eat poultry products' is a direct consumption safety assurance containing the keyword 'safe'.
'do not present an immediate public health concern' is a bare negation, not an explicit calming cue under Q5.
Reports spread of the virus in birds without explicit calming language.
Reports cause of spread without explicit calming language.
Reports cases in flocks without explicit calming language.
Reports a case on a farm without explicit calming language.
Reports cases on farms without explicit calming language.
Reports a statistic without explicit calming language.
Reports statistics without explicit calming language.
Reports cases and birds killed without explicit calming language.
Reports birds killed without explicit calming language.
Reports cases and birds killed without explicit calming language.
